translated: If the dharmas on the side of awakening and awakening are not conjoined,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma lags la /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma lags la /
translated: not disjoined,

original: gzugs can yang ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs can yang ma lags /
translated: not physical,

original: bstan du'ang ma mchis /
analyzed: bstan du'ang ma mchis /
translated: not demonstrable,

original: thogs par yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: thogs par yang ma mchis te /
translated: not obstructing,

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags na /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags na /
translated: and like this, of one mark—that is, no mark—

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ji ltar byang chub sgrub par 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ji ltar byang chub sgrub par 'gyur /
translated: how will the dharmas on the side of awakening accomplish awakening?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽ldan pa'ang ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / ldan pa'ang ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,🔽they are not conjoined,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma lags /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma lags /
translated: not disjoined,

original: gzugs can yang ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs can yang ma lags /
translated: not physical,

original: bstan du'ang ma mchis /
analyzed: bstan du'ang ma mchis /
translated: not demonstrable,

original: thogs pa'ang ma mchis te /🔽'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos ni gang la'ang sgrub pa'am /
analyzed: thogs pa'ang ma mchis te / 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos ni gang la'ang sgrub pa'am /
translated: not obstructing,🔽and like this, of one mark—that is, no mark—

original: 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so //
analyzed: 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so //
translated: so no dharma is accomplished or destroyed.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: dper bgyi na /
analyzed: dper bgyi na /
translated: for example,

original: nam mkha' ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so //
translated: Space does not establish or destroy any dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni chos gang yang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni chos gang yang sgrub pa ma lags shing 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so //
translated: in the same way, all dharmas, which are empty of their own marks, do not establish or destroy any dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: rab 'byor / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni chos gang yang sgrub pa'am 'jig par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni chos gang yang sgrub pa'am 'jig par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, dharmas that are empty of their own marks do not establish or destroy any dharma.

original: rab 'byor / sems can gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sems can gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi phyir /
translated: Subhūti, for those beings who do not know dharmas that are empty of their own marks,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di dag ni byang chub bsgrub pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di dag ni byang chub bsgrub pa yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: it is taught that these dharmas that are the aspects of awakening are the establishment of awakening.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang @49a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang @49a *//
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, whatever form there is, whatever feeling there is, whatever perception there is,

original: yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /🔽phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang; 'du shes med /
analyzed: yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang; 'du shes med /
translated: whatever volitional factors there are, whatever consciousness there is, whatever the perfection of giving is, up to whatever the perfection of wisdom is, whatever inner emptiness is,

original: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang yin pa dang /
translated: whatever outer emptiness is, up to whatever the emptiness of its own mark is, whatever the first concentration is, up to whatever the meditative stabilization of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception is, whatever the applications of mindfulness are, up to whatever the noble eightfold path is, whatever the three doors of liberation are,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar du gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar du gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, up to the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great compassion, and up to the knowledge of all aspects, all those dharmas are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /🔽gzugs can ma yin pa /🔽bstan du med pa /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa / bstan du med pa /
translated: are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,

original: thogs pa med pa /🔽'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa /🔽'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te /
translated: are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from this training of the noble dharma,🔽are not conjoined with and are not disjoined from

original: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs @49b pas sems can thams cad gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad kyi /
analyzed: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs @49b pas sems can thams cad gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad kyi /
translated: The Tathāgata has designated these in order to guide sentient beings, using worldly conventions,

original: don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: but not ultimately.

original: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad la'ang shes pa dang / mthong bas bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad la'ang shes pa dang / mthong bas bslab par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should train in knowing and seeing all of these.

original: de la shes pa dang mthong bas ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas /
analyzed: de la shes pa dang mthong bas ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas /
translated: Having trained in knowing and seeing as they are,

original: chos kha cig ni rtogs par bya /
analyzed: chos kha cig ni rtogs par bya /
translated: they should realize some dharmas,

original: chos kha cig ni rtogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos kha cig ni rtogs par mi bya'o //
translated: and they should not realize other dharmas.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti then asked,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs nas rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs nas rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags /
translated: “Blessed One, what are the dharmas that bodhisattva great beings should realize after training in knowing and seeing?

original: rtogs par mi bgyi pa'i chos rnams ni gang lags /
analyzed: rtogs par mi bgyi pa'i chos rnams ni gang lags /
translated: What are the dharmas that they should not realize?”

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should realize the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rab 'byor / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis ni shes pa dang mthong bas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis ni shes pa dang mthong bas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, it is not to be realized by the knowledge and vision of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par bya ste /
translated: It is to be realized by the knowledge of the knowledge of all aspects in all respects.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva mahāsattvas should train in this perfection of wisdom, the noble Dharma-Vinaya.”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi na /🔽bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ni gang lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bgyi na / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba ni gang lags /
translated: when it is said, ‘the noble Dharma-Vinaya, the noble Dharma-Vinaya,’🔽Lord, what is the noble Dharma-Vinaya?

original: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba @50a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba @50a *//
translated: Lord, to what extent is it the noble Dharma-Vinaya?

original: zhes bgyi / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: zhes bgyi / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to the venerable Subhūti:

original: rab 'byor / 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: “Subhūti, here the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattva mahāsattvas, and tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas are not associated with desire,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor are they dissociated from it.

original: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are not associated with anger,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor are they dissociated from it.

original: gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are not associated with delusion,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor are they dissociated from it.

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are not associated with the view of the transitory collection,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor are they dissociated from it.

original: the tshom dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: the tshom dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are not associated with doubt,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor are they dissociated from it.

original: tshul khrims dang brtul bzhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang brtul bzhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: They are not attached to or detached from the discipline and conduct of mendicancy.🔽They are not attached to or detached from the view of the transitory collection.🔽They are not attached to or detached from desire,

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: anger,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽ma rig pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽rgod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // ma rig pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // rgod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: or ignorance.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no; ;bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no; ;bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are not attached to or detached from the first concentration,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽byams pa dang ldan @50b pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // byams pa dang ldan @50b pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: up to and including the fourth concentration.🔽They are not attached to or detached from love,

original: snying rje dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: compassion,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: or equanimity.

original: dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he not associated with joy.🔽He is not associated with equanimity,

original: btang snyoms dang ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽'du shes med /
analyzed: btang snyoms dang ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // 'du shes med /
translated: nor is he not associated with equanimity.

original: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he not associated with it.🔽He is not associated with the four establishments of mindfulness, up to

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po'i bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po'i bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: great compassion,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he not associated with them.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He is not associated with the compounded element or the uncompounded element,

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he not associated with them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni gzugs can ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni gzugs can ma yin zhing /
translated: Because all those phenomena are not physical,

original: bstan du med la /
analyzed: bstan du med la /
translated: cannot be shown,

original: thogs pa med cing /
analyzed: thogs pa med cing /
translated: are unimpeded,

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and are of a single mark that is, in fact, no mark.

original: gzugs can ma yin pa de dag ni gzugs can ma yin pa dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽bstan du med pa rnams ni bstan du med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa de dag ni gzugs can ma yin pa dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // bstan du med pa rnams ni bstan du med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are not dissociated from the formless.🔽The imperceptible are not associated with the imperceptible.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽thogs pa med pa rnams ni thogs pa med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // thogs pa med pa rnams ni thogs pa med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are not dissociated from the imperceptible.🔽The unobstructed are not associated with the unobstructed.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: They are not dissociated from the unobstructed.

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //🔽mtshan nyid med pa rnams ni mtshan nyid med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no // mtshan nyid med pa rnams ni mtshan nyid med pa dang lhan cig tu ldan pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The single defining mark are not associated with the single defining mark.🔽They are not dissociated from the single defining mark.🔽The markless are not associated with the markless.

original: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: They are not dissociated from the markless.

original: rab 'byor / gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems @51a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems @51a *//
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of wisdom like that.

original: dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med cing /
analyzed: dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs med cing /
translated: “This perfection of the bodhisattvas, the great beings, the great heroes, which is like this, with a single characteristic that is no characteristic, is formless,

original: bstan du med la thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: bstan du med la thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: cannot be shown, and is unimpeded.

original: de la des bslabs na chos gang gis mtshan nyid kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la des bslabs na chos gang gis mtshan nyid kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: When they train in that, they do not apprehend any characteristic of any dharma.”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti then said to him,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing /
translated: one should not train in the characteristic of form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: one should not train in the characteristic of feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: one should not train in the characteristic of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind,

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of form, sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental phenomena.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the earth element, the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of inner emptiness.

original: @51b de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: @51b de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: Similarly, they should not train in the characteristics of the emptiness of non-apprehension, up to and including the emptiness of essential nature with respect to non-apprehension.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the first concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the second concentration, the third concentration, and the fourth concentration.

original: byams pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: byams pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of love.

original: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /🔽'du shes med /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi / 'du shes med /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the sense field of infinite space.

original: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the sense field of infinite consciousness, the sense field of nothing-at-all, and the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not train in the characteristics of the noble eightfold path.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: “One should not train in the characteristics of the meditative absorption of emptiness, the meditative absorption of signlessness, or the meditative absorption of aspirationlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: One should not train in the characteristics of the meditative absorption of the gateways to liberation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: One should not train in the characteristics of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: One should not train in the characteristics of the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: One should not train in the characteristics of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: One should not train in the characteristics of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: One should not train in the characteristics of great compassion.

original: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: One should not train in the characteristics of the noble truths of suffering,

original: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i @52a *//🔽mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i @52a *// mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path.🔽“One should not train in the characteristics of the forward and reverse progressions of dependent origination.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs su mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /🔽'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs su mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi /
translated: “One should not train in the characteristics of the conditioned realm.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi lags sam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi lags sam /
translated: “One should not train in the characteristics of the unconditioned realm.”

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing /
translated: “Blessed One, if one should not train in the characteristics of those phenomena,

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na /
translated: and if one should not train in the characteristics of conditioned phenomena,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid lam bslabs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar ji ltar 'gyur lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid lam bslabs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar ji ltar 'gyur lags /
translated: Blessed One, how will bodhisattva great beings, having trained in the characteristics of phenomena and in the characteristics of conditioned phenomena, transcend the levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas?”🔽“Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings train in the characteristics of phenomena and in the characteristics of conditioned phenomena, they will transcend the levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur lags /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur lags /
translated: How could they enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva without going beyond the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang /
translated: And without entering into the secure state of a bodhisattva,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang ji ltar 'gyur lags /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang ji ltar 'gyur lags /
translated: how could they attain the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ji ltar 'gyur lags /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ji ltar 'gyur lags /
translated: And without attaining the knowledge of all aspects, how could they turn the wheel of the Dharma?

original: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
translated: And without turning the wheel of the Dharma, how could they liberate beings from saṃsāra through the vehicle of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
translated: the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: theg pa chen po'i sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar ji ltar 'gyur lags /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar ji ltar 'gyur lags /
translated: or the Great Vehicle?”🔽Venerable Subhūti having made this request, the Lord said to him,

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces @52b bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces @52b bka' stsal to //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: rab 'byor / gal te chos 'ga' zhig gi mtshan nyid yod par gyur na ni mtshan nyid de la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya ba zhig na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te chos 'ga' zhig gi mtshan nyid yod par gyur na ni mtshan nyid de la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya ba zhig na /
translated: Subhūti, if the defining characteristics of any dharma existed, then the Bodhisattva would have to train in those defining characteristics.

original: rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa /
translated: Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are without defining characteristics,

original: gzugs can ma yin pa /
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa /
translated: are not form,

original: bstan du med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa /
translated: are not demonstrable,

original: thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: and are unimpeded.

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de dag la'ang bslab par mi bya /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de dag la'ang bslab par mi bya /
translated: Because they are all of one defining characteristic, which is no defining characteristic, therefore the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva should not train in those defining characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: and should not train in the absence of defining characteristics.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / snga na mtshan nyid yod la phyis mtshan nyid med par gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / snga na mtshan nyid yod la phyis mtshan nyid med par gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the defining characteristics do not exist first and then become nonexistent later.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar de dag ni snga nas kyang mtshan nyid med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar de dag ni snga nas kyang mtshan nyid med la /
translated: Subhūti, it is because they have been without defining characteristics from the beginning,

original: da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pa ste /
translated: and are without defining characteristics now.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings should not train in characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: and they should not train in the absence of characteristics.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: Subhūti, whether the tathāgatas arise or do not arise,🔽the dharmadhātu remains.🔽And why is that?🔽Subhūti, the dharmadhātu is the dharmadhātu.🔽The very limit of reality is the very limit of reality.🔽The sphere of reality is the sphere of reality.🔽The thusness of all phenomena is the thusness of all phenomena.

original: mtshan nyid kyi khams de ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi khams de ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The signless is the signless.🔽The wishless is the wishless.🔽The unconditioned is the unconditioned.🔽The ultimate is the ultimate.🔽The unmistaken thusness is the unmistaken thusness.🔽The unaltered thusness is the unaltered thusness.🔽The true nature is the true nature.🔽The dharma-constituent is the dharma-constituent.🔽The establishment of dharmas is the establishment of dharmas.🔽The way things are is the way things are.🔽The inconceivable basic element is the inconceivable basic element.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The uncompounded is the uncompounded.🔽The unconditioned is the unconditioned.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The ultimate is the ultimate.🔽The unmistaken thusness is the unmistaken thusness.🔽The unaltered thusness is the unaltered thusness.🔽The true nature is the true nature.🔽The dharma-constituent is the dharma-constituent.

original: gal te chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis shing mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags la /
analyzed: gal te chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis shing mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags la /
translated: The establishment of dharmas is the establishment of dharmas.🔽The way things are is the way things are.🔽The inconceivable basic element is the inconceivable basic element.🔽The uncompounded is the uncompounded.🔽The unconditioned is the unconditioned.🔽The ultimate is the ultimate.

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The unmistaken thusness is the unmistaken thusness.🔽The unaltered thusness is the unaltered thusness.🔽The true nature is the true nature.🔽The dharma-constituent is the dharma-constituent.🔽The establishment of dharmas is the establishment of dharmas.🔽The way things are is the way things are.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji @53a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji @53a *//
translated: The inconceivable basic element is the inconceivable basic element.🔽The uncompounded is the uncompounded.🔽The unconditioned is the unconditioned.🔽The ultimate is the ultimate.🔽The unmistaken thusness is the unmistaken thus

original: ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par 'gyur /
analyzed: ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par 'gyur /
translated: In this way, they will cultivate the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar rngo mi thogs lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar rngo mi thogs lags so //
translated: without cultivating the perfection of wisdom, bodhisattva great beings cannot transcend the levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par rngo mi thogs la /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par rngo mi thogs la /
translated: Without transcending the levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas, bodhisattva great beings cannot enter into the bodhisattvas’ faultless state.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs lags so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs lags so //
translated: Without entering into the bodhisattvas’ faultless state, they cannot give rise to the acceptance that phenomena are unborn.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par yang mngon par shes pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par shes pa ma bskyed par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par yang mngon par shes pa bskyed par rngo mi thogs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par shes pa ma bskyed par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /
translated: Without generating the acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena, it is impossible to generate the superknowledges, and without generating the superknowledges, bodhisattva great beings are also unable to purify a buddha realm.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi bgyi la sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par rngo mi thogs la /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi bgyi la sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par rngo mi thogs la /
translated: “It is not possible to generate the superknowledges without generating the patience for the nonproduction of dharmas, and it is not possible for bodhisattva great beings to purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity without generating the superknowledges.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar rngo mi thogs lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar rngo mi thogs lags so //
translated: “It is not possible to attain the knowledge of all aspects without purifying a buddhafield and bringing beings to maturity, and it is not possible to turn the wheel of the Dharma without attaining the knowledge of all aspects.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par rngo mi thogs la /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par rngo mi thogs la /
translated: “It is not possible to establish beings in the result of stream enterer without turning the wheel of the Dharma,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang @53b dgod par rngo mi thogs /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang @53b dgod par rngo mi thogs /
translated: I am unable to establish them in the result of once-returners,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang dgod par yang rngo mi thogs /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs / dgra bcom pa nyid la'ang dgod par yang rngo mi thogs /
translated: in the result of non-returners,🔽in the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs /
analyzed: rang byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs /
translated: in the state of a pratyekabuddha,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so //
translated: or in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang sems can rnams dgod par rngo mi thogs //🔽tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs /
analyzed: sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang sems can rnams dgod par rngo mi thogs // tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs /
translated: I am unable to establish beings in the bases of meritorious action that come from generosity,🔽in the bases of meritorious action that come from morality,

original: bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so //
analyzed: bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la'ang dgod par rngo mi thogs lags so //
translated: or in the bases of meritorious action that come from meditation.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to the venerable Su­bhūti as follows:

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Su­bhūti, that is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: That is exactly how it is!

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med de /
translated: Su­bhūti, all things are without defining characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin la /
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin la /
translated: They do not have different defining characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te /
translated: They do not have the same defining characteristics.

original: rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa la bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mtshan nyid med pa la bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yin no //
translated: Su­bhūti, the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom by bodhisattva great beings is the cultivation of that which is without defining characteristics.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la bsgom pa /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags /🔽bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la bsgom pa / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags / bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One replied:

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: “Su­bhūti, the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the cultivation of the disintegration of all things.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” The Blessed One replied:🔽“Su­bhūti, the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the cultivation of the non-apprehension of all things.

original: chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol @54a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol @54a *//
translated: How does one know the dissolution of meditation on all phenomena?

original: tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags /
translated: How does the cultivation of the destruction of all dharmas constitute the perfection of wisdom?

original: bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Lord said:

original: gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of form is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mig la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mig la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the eyes is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang; lce dang / lus dang / yid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang; lce dang / lus dang / yid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o; ;sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o; ;sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: smell, taste, touch, and dharmas is meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: blang ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: blang ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of meditation on acceptance is meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: dor ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of meditation on rejection is meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan dang po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of meditation on the first concentration is meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of meditation on the second, third, and fourth concentrations is meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: byams pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the meditation on love is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the meditation on compassion, on sympathetic joy, and on equanimity is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: @54b nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: @54b nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the meditation on the sphere of infinite space is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the meditation on the sphere of infinite consciousness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //🔽'du shes med /
analyzed: ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o // 'du shes med /
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the meditation on the sphere of nothingness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du shes med min skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med min skye mched la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the destruction of the meditation on the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the recollection of the Buddha is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang /
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang /
translated: The cultivation of the recollection of the Dharma, the recollection of the Saṅgha, the recollection of morality, the recollection of renunciation, the recollection of the gods, the recollection of displeasure, the recollection of breathing,

original: dbyung ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dbyung ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: the recollection of peace, the recollection of death, and the cultivation of the recollection of the body are the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering, and the perception of non-self is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation on the destruction of the meditation on dependent origination is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdag tu 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bdag tu 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of self is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / skye ba @55a *//
analyzed: sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / skye ba @55a *//
translated: The meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of a being,

original: por 'du shes pa dang / shed las skyes par 'du shes pa dang / shed bur 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / byed pa por 'du shes pa dang / byed du 'jug pa por 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: por 'du shes pa dang / shed las skyes par 'du shes pa dang / shed bur 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / byed pa por 'du shes pa dang / byed du 'jug pa por 'du shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: the meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of a soul, the meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of a man, the meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of humanity, the meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of one born of Manu, the meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of an individual, the meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of an agent, the meditation on the destruction of the meditation on the notion of an instigator is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the meditation on the notion of permanence, the notion of pleasure, the notion of purity, and the notion of self is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the meditation on the applications of mindfulness is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the meditation on the right efforts, the legs of supernatural power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, and the noble eightfold path is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the meditation on the concentration of emptiness is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the concentration on signlessness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the concentration on wishlessness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the eight liberations is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i @55b snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i @55b snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the nine serial absorptions is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the concentration with applied thought and sustained thought, and the concentration without applied thought but with sustained thought, and the concentration without applied thought and without sustained thought, is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the noble truth of suffering as destruction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the noble truth of the origin, of cessation, and of the path as destruction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the knowledge of suffering as destruction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: kun 'byung ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the knowledge of the origin as destruction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'gog pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the knowledge of cessation as destruction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: lam shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: lam shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the knowledge of the path as destruction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: zad pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the knowledge of extinction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi skye ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the knowledge of non-arising is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: chos shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the knowledge of dharmas is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rjes su rtogs pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes @56a *//🔽rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //🔽kun rdzob shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su rtogs pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes @56a *// rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o // kun rdzob shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of subsequent knowledge is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The destruction of the cultivation of conventional knowledge is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'dris pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'dris pa shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of knowledge of what is familiar is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sgra ji bzhin shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin shes pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the meditation on the perfection of wisdom is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.🔽The destruction of the meditation on the perfection of giving is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the meditation on the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, and similarly, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //🔽mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o // mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the ten powers of the tathāgatas is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The destruction of the cultivation of the four fearlessnesses is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsgom pa @56b rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsgom pa @56b rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of great compassion is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o; ;lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o; ;lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the fruit of stream-entry is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom; the destruction of the cultivation of the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and arhatship is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang byang chub la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of individual enlightenment is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o; ;bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o; ;bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the knowledge of all modes is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: pa la bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: pa la bsgom pa'o //
translated: The destruction of the cultivation of the relinquishment of all the residues is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Subhuti said to him:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: gzugs la rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: gzugs la rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags /
translated: how is the destruction of form the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: de bzhin du bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: de bzhin du bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba'i bar la bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa lags /
translated: How is the destruction of the cultivation of the relinquishment of all the residues the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis @57a *//
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis @57a *//
translated: The Lord:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Lord said to the venerable Subhūti:

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo //
analyzed: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo //
translated: do not meditate on ‘form is a thing.’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo //
translated: They do not meditate on ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is a thing.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos por 'du shes pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa med cing /
translated: Subhūti, those who perceive a thing do not meditate on the perfection of wisdom.
